task.title: Scaling Group Detail - Instances
task.shortdesc: An Auto Scaling group defines the parameters for the Eucalyptus instances that are used for scaling, as well as the minimum, maximum, and desired number of instances to use for Auto Scaling your application. This page allows you to view and edit a scaling group. For more information on Auto Scaling, please see Using Auto Scaling in the Eucalyptus User Guide.

task.title: Instances
task.shortdesc: This tab allows you to view and manage instances in the auto scaling group.

task.title: Context menu actions
task.shortdesc: Each entry in the policies list has a context menu, accessible by clicking on the menu icon (row of three dots), with actions that you can perform on the selected policy.

taskbody.context: The following context menu actions are available:

step.cmd: This item allows you to view the details page for the selected instance.
This item allows you to mark an instance as unhealthy. This will cause auto scaling to terminate the instance and launch a new instance to replace it.
This action terminates the selected instance.
